SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core

Class YaegerStage

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.core.YaegerStage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable
public class YaegerStage extends Object implements Initializable
A YaegerStage encapsulates an JavaFX Stage. It defines the window that is being used and contains the SceneCollection that contains all instances of YaegerScene that are part of the YaegerGame.

  • Constructor Details

    • YaegerStage

      public YaegerStage(YaegerGame yaegerGame, javafx.stage.Stage stage, YaegerConfig yaegerConfig)
      Create a new YaegerStage with the given parameters. A YaegerStage encapsulates a Stage, which is the representation of the window. The Scene, which is encapsulated by the YaegerScene will then represent the content of the window.
      Parameters:
      yaegerGame - the YaegerGame for which this YaegerStage is created
      stage - the Stage that should be encapsulated. This Stage is created by JavaFX whenever a JavaFX is created
      yaegerConfig - the YaegerConfig that contains runtime configurations for this YaegerGame

  • Method Details

    • setSize

      public void setSize(Size size)
      Set the Size, being the width and height of the game.
      Parameters:
      size - a Size object that encapsulates the width and height of the game

    • init

      public void init(com.google.inject.Injector injector)
      Specified by:
      init in interface Initializable
      Parameters:
      injector - the Injector used for Dependency Injection

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.

    • quit

      public void quit()
      Stop and close the Game.

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle(String title)
      Set the title of the Game.
      Parameters:
      title - a String containing the title of the Game

    • addScene

      public void addScene(int id, YaegerScene scene)
      Add a YaegerScene to the YaegerStage.
      Parameters:
      id - the number as an int that identifies the YaegerScene. By calling the method setActiveScene(int) the added YaegerScene can be set as the active one
      scene - the YaegerScene that should be added

    • setActiveScene

      public void setActiveScene(int id)
      Set the current active YaegerScene.
      Parameters:
      id - the Integer identifying the YaegerScene

    • setSceneCollectionFactory

      @Inject public void setSceneCollectionFactory(SceneCollectionFactory sceneCollectionFactory)
      Set the SceneCollectionFactory to be used whenever a SceneCollection has to be created.
      Parameters:
      sceneCollectionFactory - the SceneCollectionFactory

    • setSceneFactory

      @Inject public void setSceneFactory(SceneFactory sceneFactory)
      Set the SceneFactory to be used whenever a Scene has to be created.
      Parameters:
